name: Pan-fried Scallops With Chilli, Ginger & An Anchovy Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
8 anchovy fillets in olive oil, drained and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1-2 tbs of the olive oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add the potatoes, and sauté for 15-20 minutes until golden and cooked through. Drain on kitchen paper, and set aside to keep warm.

Meanwhile, make the anchovy dressing. In a jug, whisk together the extra virgin olive oil, vinegar, and anchovies until well combined. Taste, and add a pinch of sugar if it needs it. Season with pepper.

Pat the scallops dry with kitchen paper, and season with salt and pepper. Put the remaining olive oil in the frying pan over a high heat. When hot, add the scallops. Sear for about 1 minute, then turn them over. Add the chilli and ginger, and squeeze over the lemon juice, being careful, as it will spit. Remove the pan from the heat, and sprinkle over the parsley.
Serve immediately with the sautéed potatoes and a drizzle of the anchovy dressing.
